text.section:
After a sale of goods consigned for sale by a person in this State to a person engaged in the business of selling goods on consignment, the consignee shall transmit to the consignor within 24 hours after the sale a full account of the sale, including:
The amount and price of the goods sold; and
The name and address of the purchaser, including the house or business number, street, and city.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine of $5 for each violation, and court costs.
